description: personal website showcasing my projects, highlighting my React and TypeScript expertise along with my broader skill set.

name: Snake
description: This is a small educational task with python. I tried to create the game snake in python and tried to keep improving myself.

name: KCY-Accounting
description: Cross-platform order and customer management, etc app with TCP-based license validation. Built in .NET 8 using Avalonia UI. Solo project by me

name: Incremental
description: A modern incremental/idle game built with Avalonia UI and .NET 8, featuring a custom big number system, passive income mechanics, and a beautiful GitHub Dark-themed interface.

name: Kerlib
description: Kerlib is a lightweight modern Win32 windowing library for C#. It offers high performance, low memory overhead, and is easy to extend with custom drawing components and event handling.

name: K-Chat
description: Real-time chat application built with JavaFX and WebSockets, featuring multi-client messaging, JSON-based communication, and a simple desktop UI.

name: HtmlForge
description: Open Source java library to generate html sites with style in Java with classes
